metadata.title: CVE-2017-18379 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel before 4.14, an out of boundary access happened indrivers/nvme/target/fc.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18379` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
